term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - hydrogen bond in theoretical organic chemistry
term.title: hydrogen bond

item.text: A particular type of multicenter (three center - four electron) X–H ...Y in which the central hydrogen atom covalently linked to an electronegative atom X (C, N, O, S..) forms an additional weaker bond with atom Y (N, O, S..) in the direction of its lone electron pair orbital. The energy of hydrogen bonds, which is usually in the range of 3-15 kcal/mol–12-65 kJ/mol (–), results from the electrostatic interaction and also from the orbital interaction of the antibonding σ*(XH)MO of the molecule acting as the hydrogen donor and the non-bonding lone electron pair MOnY of the hydrogen acceptor molecule.
